name: Monster Truck Toto Desert Race
description:
Monster Truck Toto Desert Race is an action packed with monster truck game. It is a monster truck race games simulator filled with thrill and joy. You cannot find other interesting monster truck race games on Play Store. This breathtaking monster truck game in a monster truck will give you goosebumps. Among all monster truck games this game is crazy drifting in desert. There are not many monster trucks in this game play but only single monster truck is enough to give you full entertainment. Hold on! Now you can enjoy monster jam anytime anywhere without the restriction of time. Thrill with crazy drift in desert ruins is best fun you can ever have. For avoiding hurdles jumping is required and monster truck jump is the most fun part of this amazing game. Not many desert racing games provides tricky turbo climb and pitch shoot monster. Toto desert racing games provides amazing desert trip and desert speed racing. Many desert racing games does not provide astounding game environment but Toto monster truck race provides incredible monster truck racing. Toto truck games have big trucks and deadly offroad race. Toto truck game is monster stimulator of 2016. Toto is best monster truck stunt games of 2017. It gives you full guide of monster truck drive and deadly offroad race. Go on and play your most favorite desert racing game….. 

MONSTER TRUCK RACE TOTO DESERT FEATURES
o Thrilling background and exciting background music
o Easy to play
o Smooth controls
o Marvelous asphalt monster truck 
o Crazy drift
o Crazy drift truck
o In future iron finding will also be introduce 
o Easy to play 
o Very challenging
o Tilt screen to move left and right
o Increase your speed for gaining more points 
o Curvy path
o Dangerous roads
o Collect coins on your way
o Avoid obstacles 

TIPS
o Collect gas cans to keep your tank full
o Increase and decrease speed according to your requirement

Get ready for monster mash and experience desert dirt bike. Experience the real desert storm game. Mind blowing surprises are coming to your way!!!! 

Give us your feedback!! :)
